alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 10:56AM CDT until March 29 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo affecting Cass County. Sheyenne River near Kindred affecting Richland and Cass Counties. Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. Agricultural damage begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 15.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday to a crest of 18.5 feet Friday. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
